entry.title: Sunday night: A few showers. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few showers ending early this evening then clearing. Fog patches developing early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023
